scripts.dev:all: bunx concurrently -n web,admin,api -c blue,magenta,green "bun --cwd apps/web dev" "bun --cwd apps/admin dev" "bun --cwd services/api dev"
scripts.build:all: bash -lc 'for d in apps/* services/* packages/*; do if [ -f "$d/package.json" ]; then echo Building $d; (cd "$d" && bun run build || true); fi; done'
scripts.typecheck: bash -lc 'set -e; for d in apps/* services/* packages/*; do if [ -f "$d/tsconfig.json" ]; then echo Typechecking $d; (cd "$d" && tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit); fi; done'
